metadata.title: CVE-2021-47166 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: NFS:Don't corrupt the value of pg_bytes_written in nfs_do_recoalesce() Thevalue of mirror->pg_bytes_written should only be updated after a successfulattempt to flush out the requests on the list.

criterions.comment: linux package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-lts-xenial package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-aws package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
linux-azure package in trusty is affected and may need fixing.
